A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Probably the BEST Star Wars film that has been made. With Star Wars itself being about a Galaxy far far away\, Rian Johnson knew exactly how to finish off one story without completely diminishing its roots and start fresh with a new generation of Jedi and Sith that isn't reflected on one specific person or bloodline. 5 Stars to Rian Johnson's Star Wars: The Last Jedi.
